scripts.browser-sync: browser-sync start --files "zoo_checks/static/css/*.css, zoo_checks/static/js/*.js, zoo_checks/**/*.py, zoo_checks/templates/*.html, templates/*.html" --proxy 127.0.0.1:8000 --reload-delay=1000 --reload-debounce=500
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run css-watch" "python -Wa manage.py runserver" "npm run browser-sync"
